title: Bitcoin open interest dives, but bottom could see ‘renewed bullish trend’
contentSnippet: Bitcoin open interest has seen a sharp decline in the last month, which one analyst says could form a “solid bottom” for it to climb back from.

title: Department of Government Efficiency Winds Down Despite Months Left To Run: Report
contentSnippet: The administration’s DOGE office has gone dormant months early as the White House weighs easier paths to close federal units.

title: JPMorgan Chase Ends Banking Ties With Strike CEO, Rekindling Crypto Debanking Concerns
contentSnippet: JPMorgan Chase’s move has renewed scrutiny of alleged anti-crypto debanking despite a Trump order banning the practice.

title: DOGE Beats the Blue Chips as D.O.G.E Calls it Quits
contentSnippet: DOGE – the memecoin – edged past the CoinDesk 20 and the CoinDesk memecoin index as the White House announced Elon Musk's government efficiency initiative is to shutter.

title: Bitcoin ETFs, Led By BlackRock's IBIT, See Record $40B Trading Volume as Institutions Capitulate
contentSnippet: The U.S.-listed spot bitcoin ETFs saw a record $40 billion in trading volume last week, with IBIT leading the way.

title: Rising crypto token value capture may fuel 2026 rebound: Bitwise CIO
contentSnippet: Bitwise’s Matt Hougan says tokens are getting better at returning value to holders, and Ethereum's Fusako upgrade could “increase token value capture.”

title: Bitcoin Logs Longest Losing Streak Since 2024 as Fed Repricing Fuels Cautious Rebound
contentSnippet: Bitcoin's longest weekly slump in over a year puts it on track for its worst quarter since 2018, with a potential bull trap looming.

title: VanEck boss questions Bitcoin’s privacy, encryption against quantum tech
contentSnippet: Jan van Eck says quantum computing could threaten Bitcoin's encryption and privacy, and his firm “will walk away” if it’s “fundamentally broken.”

title: NYSE approves Grayscale DOGE and XRP ETFs, clearing launch for Monday
contentSnippet: NYSE Arca has greenlit the launch of Grayscale’s exchange-traded funds tied to Dogecoin and XRP, with the products set to go live for trading on Monday.

title: ソラナのインフレ率を下げる改善提案　今後6年で2,230万SOLの発行量削減見込む
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ソラナのコミュニティがインフレ減少率を引き上げる改善提案を公開した。目標インフレ率への到達が6年から3年に短縮する見込みだ。

title: Bitcoin’s demand engines reverse, but long-term trajectory intact: NYDIG
contentSnippet: Exchange-traded fund inflows and crypto treasury demand were key to Bitcoin’s all-time high, but they’re now causing its decline, says NYDIG’s Greg Cipolaro.

title: Bitwise CIO Says Most DATs Are Headed for Discounts, Not Premiums: Here's Why
contentSnippet: Bitwise's Hougan argues that structural drag in DATs outweighs the few uncertain paths firms have to lift their crypto-per-share.

title: 「仮想通貨市場の弱体化、背景にマーケットメーカーの機能不全」トム・リーが指摘
contentSnippet: ビットマイン会長が仮想通貨市場の下落が続いている要因を分析した。10月10日の清算イベントがマーケットメーカーを機能不全にしていると見解を示している。

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Why This Billionaire Collector Continues to Buy NFTs in 2025
contentSnippet: Businessman Adam Weitsman recently doubled down on NFTs with a record Meebits purchase, and says he’s never sold an NFT—and doesn’t plan to.

title: ETF Outflows, Stablecoin Flows and DAT Reversals Signal Crypto Capital Flight: NYDIG
contentSnippet: Spot bitcoin ETFs have seen persistent outflows ($3.55 billion in November), and stablecoin supply has declined, indicating capital is leaving the market, NYDIG Said.

title: Strategy and Bitcoin supporters call for 'boycott' of JP Morgan
contentSnippet: The tension erupted following news that Strategy and other crypto treasury companies would likely be excluded from major market indexes.

title: Satoshi Nakamoto's Bitcoin Wealth Falls By $41 Billion, Now Poorer Than Bill Gates
contentSnippet: Satoshi Nakamoto's Bitcoin-based net worth took a heavy hit as BTC dropped more than 30% from its all-time high set in October.

title: State of Crypto: What Congress Has Left to Do This Year
contentSnippet: There is not a lot of time left for Congress to make meaningful progress this year on crypto issues.

title: Bitcoin volatility surge may signal return to options-driven prices: Analyst
contentSnippet: The rising volatility suggests a potential return to levels seen before the launch of BTC exchange-traded funds, which dampened volatility.

title: What Is a Layer-1 Blockchain? The Base Layer Powering Bitcoin and Crypto
contentSnippet: Layer-1 blockchains are the base networks that secure and record every crypto transaction, powering Bitcoin, Ethereum, and beyond.

title: More Ready Than Bitcoin? How Zcash Developers Are Preparing for the Quantum Threat
contentSnippet: Quantum computers could threaten much more than just Bitcoin, but developers behind the surging Zcash say they aren't panicking. Here's why.

title: Sunrise Debut Streamlines Solana Token Imports as Monad Goes Live
contentSnippet: The platform introduces a unified gateway that allows issuers and users to move tokens from any ecosystem into Solana.

title: Bitcoin Rebounds From 'Extreme Oversold' Levels; XRP Jumps 7%, ZEC Surges 14%
contentSnippet: Bitcoin and major altcoins bounced Sunday after an oversold RSI reading and more than $200M in liquidations signaled seller exhaustion amid thin weekend liquidity.

title: Could Stablecoins Spark a New Contagion? BIS Warns, Coinbase Pushes Back
contentSnippet: Not all agree with some recent sentiment that stablecoins pose a threat to global financial stability.

title: On-Chain Stocks Could Misprice Over Weekends, Triggering Arbitrage Risks: RedStone
contentSnippet: This gap could create a "price dislocation" between on-chain and traditional markets, leading to potential losses or arbitrage opportunities.

title: Cardano Temporarily Splits Into Two Chains After Attacker Uses AI-Generated Script to Exploit a Known Bug
contentSnippet: The divergence emerged when newer nodes accepted a malformed transaction that older nodes rejected.

title: Grayscale calls Chainlink the ‘crictical connective tissue’ of tokenized finance
contentSnippet: Grayscale says Chainlink will anchor the next phase of blockchain adoption, positioning LINK as the core infrastructure powering tokenization.

title: VanEck CEO Concerned About Bitcoin's Encryption and Privacy, Says Firm Could Walk Away
contentSnippet: Jan van Eck questioned whether Bitcoin offers enough encryption and privacy, saying some longtime holders are examining Zcash as the market reassesses long-term assumptions.

title: Zcash risks ‘splitting the vote’ against Bitcoin, Bloomberg ETF analyst warns
contentSnippet: Bloomberg’s Eric Balchunas says Zcash could dilute political and cultural support for Bitcoin, as critics accuse the privacy coin of manufactured hype.

title: 今週の主要仮想通貨材料まとめ、ヴィタリック紹介のイーサリアム新ツールやXRPのステーキング導入案など
contentSnippet: 前週比で振り返る仮想通貨市場の最新動向。ビットコインやイーサリアム、XRP、ソラナなど主要銘柄の騰落率や注目材料を一挙紹介。市場トレンドと関連ニュースを詳しく解説する。

title: ビットコイン売られ過ぎでも反転せず、12月FOMCの据え置きが現実味を増す｜bitbankアナリスト寄稿
contentSnippet: 今週のBTC対円相場は1400万円割れまで下落。ヌビディア好決算後も1400万円割れが続き、米雇用統計の強弱まちまちな内容が見通し悪化を助長。12月FOMCでの金利据え置き観測が強まる。

title: 週刊仮想通貨ニュース｜金融庁の暗号資産規制方針やビットコイン採掘割合の95%到達に高い関心
contentSnippet: 今週は、金融庁の仮想通貨規制方針、ビットコイン採掘割合の95%到達、ビットコインとイーサリアムの市況分析に関する記事が関心を集めた。

title: Bitcoin ATM Firm Weighing $100 Million Sale Following Money Laundering Charges
contentSnippet: Chicago-based Crypto Dispensers says it’s considering a $100 million sale, just days after the firm and its founder were hit with money laundering charges.

title: Group Asks Federal Agency to Halt Use of Elon Musk's Grok AI Amid Racism Concerns
contentSnippet: Analysis showed Grok citing extremist sites as credible sources, raising another red flag after the AI's earlier "MechaHitler" incident.

title: ANAPホールディングス、企業向けビットコイン戦略支援「ビットコイン道場」を開始
contentSnippet: ANAPホールディングスが企業のビットコイン活用を支援する継続型プログラム「ANAPビットコイン道場」の提供を開始した。会計や税務などの実務を専門家が包括的にサポートし、参加企業がコミュニティ形式で課題解決に取り組む仕組みを提供する。

title: コンヴァノがビットコイン戦略から本業回帰、AI・ヘルスケア事業に注力へ
contentSnippet: コンヴァノが仮想通貨ビットコインを最大約2万BTC取得する計画を取り下げ、成長中の事業へ軸足を移す。業績予想を上方修正しており本業成長を重視する戦略転換となる。

title: 米当局がビットメイン製品を国家安全保障リスクで調査、トランプ関連企業も1万6000台使用
contentSnippet: 米国土安全保障省が中国メーカーのビットメインを調査し、機器がスパイ活動や電力網破壊に使用される可能性を指摘。トランプ大統領の息子たちの会社アメリカン・ビットコインも1万6000台を購入した。

title: コインベース、ソラナのミームコイン取引所「ベクター」を買収
contentSnippet: コインベースがソラナ基盤SocialFiプラットフォーム「ベクター・ファン」を買収すると発表した。年内に取引完了予定で、ソラナエコシステムへの参入を拡大し、すべてを取引できる取引所の構築を目指す。

title: ベセント米財務長官、ビットコインバーにサプライズ訪問　仮想通貨業界への影響は
contentSnippet: スコット・ベセント米財務長官がビットコインバー「Pubkey DC」を訪問し、仮想通貨コミュニティで話題になっている。業界関係者の反応と今後の影響を解説する。
